column4: hi. this is the first time im running the live dvd... always installed from install cd... but i know there is an option to install from the live dvd... how do i do that ?
it's the latest live dvd of flight 5
i can't find the way to install from the dvd :( been waiting for the whole night for it to download :(
dang... dont tell me that i have to download another CD instead of the dvd
enabled/adjusted boot from cd priority in the bios?
it boots from the dvd all right
it waits for a boot command
then you can press F1 for help or enter for boot
it hints at a few doesn't it?
i didn't see anything about install there
